TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlServerRuntimeModelConvention extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Conventions.RelationalRuntimeModelConvention

Docs.summary: A convention that creates an optimized copy of the mutable model.
Docs.remarks: See Model building conventions, and Accessing SQL Server and Azure SQL databases with EF Core for more information and examples.
